document.full_text: singapore's long-ruling people's action party (pap) swept back to power as expected in the most contested general election since independence, but the opposition made historic gains in what both sides called a landmark vote.
document.title: singapore's pap retains power; opposition makes gains
lines_and_colors: singapore's long-ruling people's action party (pap) swept back to power as expected in the most contested general election since independence, but the opposition made historic gains in what both sides called a landmark vote.
